mapper.insert: INSERT INTO battle_sessions (user_id, battle_id, status, mode, civ, stage_no, tower_floor, general_id, seed, current_turn, max_turn, context_json, state_json, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{battleId}, #{status}, #{mode}, #{civ}, #{stageNo}, #{towerFloor}, #{generalId}, #{seed}, #{currentTurn}, #{maxTurn}, #{contextJson}, #{stateJson}, NOW(), NOW())
